pullRequest.title: Issue #7737: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - InvalidJavadocP…
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #7737
The check already reports violation to DetailAST node:

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/InvalidJavadocPositionCheck.java
    
    
         Line 96
      in
      34615b4
    
    
    
    

        
          
           log(ast, MSG_KEY); 
        
    
  


Diff file:
https://sulkykookie.github.io/invalidjavadocposition

nodes.bodyText:
"RuntimeException" I guess this is leftover of copy-pasting from other issue.
Please correct here and below.

beforeCommit.message: Issue #7737: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - InvalidJavadocPosition

afterCommit.message: Issue #7737: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - InvalidJavadocPosition

nodes.bodyText:
You are giving the file name as SuppressionXpathRegressionInvalidJavaDocPositionOne but the actual file name is SuppressionXpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionFive.
CI is right and your file names are wrong and that is why it says it can't find them.
